metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5714 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress before 4.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging the mishandling of unclosed HTML elements during processing of shortcode tags.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5714` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.3.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1+dfsg-1').
